title: Low priority que's
body:
Im sick and tired of these low priority ques...i cant help that my drive crashes randomly when i play a game...i CANNOT help that my drive crashes..i have to reset my computer just to re-log in to league and find that my team is down and disadvantaged...
I try my damn near best..put my heart into the fights....
match ends....
I im rewarded with....
5 20 minute low priority ques....
Each day for the last 3 days ive had to grind my way past this low priority que...
Riot Cut me some slack.
I don't deserve this damn low priority que.
I put so much effort into this game..
Thanks to my (d) drive crashing...in loading screen....
MY LUCK.

Its not my fault my computer crashes..
Im kinda sick of this,altogether if this happens again im gonna have to quit lol.
and pursue something more stable..
why should i have to wait so long..
I disappoint my team..myself..and the opposition.
My intentions is to have a good game..
Thanks riot..
Would love my low priority lifted....
Thanks for the help.....

replies.body: You do deserve this. You left the game and will be punished for it. You are making other players games unpleasent because you leave. It is not riots problem that you are leaving it is your own. If you know that your having problem with disconnecting than dont play its simple.
wanna settle this in a 1v1?

1v1 your bronze 5 u dont stand a chance. also game is about teamwork not 1v1 thats probs why ur bronze. U do deserve this i know u dont mean to leave the games but u have to be punished for ruining other peoples games.
Enjoy your low priority que :P

game is about team work..but when it comes to 1v1's ..thats a different story..even the pro's and the commentators know...

when you try to put me down..thinking im lower than you..i suggest you educate yourself.

(clearly you are lower than me you cant even keep yourself together.)

The most obvious troll b8...
Rioot???

i have links that follow a conversation with him...

This thread needs to be cleaned up..this guy came in and trolled me..
I reckon he came here to troll...
it is obvious you think a God of yourself.
personally ive already reported you for harassment..now abuse.

must be a narcissist trying to find there supply..
Putting other people down..and elating yourself up...
im not taking the b8 m8..let riot sort this.
once again im not intereted in 1v1 against a bronze 5 player im almost diamond myself and will not waste my time in a game with you. :D

what truely ruins peoples games...is when i wait 20 mins to have some stubborn ass darius go top lane and feed and than quit....yup...that deserves a ban

when i simple cant join and havent fed.

B5 or not...you too chicken....why are you not punished for being such an arrogant asshole?

Im not being punished because i have done nothing wrong im just saying that you deserve punishment for what you did. Now your being very abusive and i dont like that. Enjoy your low priority que  you deserve every single game of it :P

You believe you have done nothing wrong...
Your ego is so elated your blind to your own incompassion.
Im obviously reacting to your sly remarks...
i even suggested we sort it our with a 1v1....But you say you have done nothing wrong..
You judge me based upon my rank..you say you would not waste your "time with me" yet your here talking trash....
let a riot employee sort this out...sick of your 2 cents..you wont even 1v1 me..so you will intellectually 1v1..emotionally manipulating me....

Cause you have done nothing wrong Mr diamond player...
You also assume i lack understanding with the game...thanks for your cunning.
you are not worth my time not gonna respond anymore enjoy your low priority que :P
Cause you know im right.
that you came here to talk trash..
99% of my games work...

You actually deserve this.

You know there is a problem with your computer but you seem to be refusing to fix the issue.
You don't deserve to play until you FIX YOUR COMPUTER!
Your connection is ENTIRELY in your control, you simply refuse to take responsibility for a computer that you've damaged.
Is this just another alternate account of yours rocka?

Right yes, I am an alternate account, despite my account being around and posting longer than the person you're accusing me of being a alternate of.

And oh yes, scathing, I hurt your feelings, despite calling out that you've deliberately ruined games for other people because you refuse to fix your very manageable problems with your computer.
Spot on :D
I dont think you deserve to play till you fix your attitude,you simply refuse to take responsibility for a consciousness you have damaged.
